sentences.en: After the wheat crop has been gathered, many farmers burn the remains and plough the ash into the soil , so as to enrich the soil.
sentences.cn: 割完小麦后, 许多农夫把麦秸烧掉,并把灰烬埋入土中, 以增加土壤肥力.

sentences.en: Farmers occasionally plough up old Indian relics.
sentences.cn: 农夫们偶尔能犁出古老的印第安人遗物.

sentences.en: Farmers plough in autumn or spring.
sentences.cn: 农民在秋天或春天犁田.

sentences.en: He has a very large acreage under the plough.
He that by the plough would thrive himself must either hold or drive.
sentences.cn: 想靠犁杖过好日子的人必须亲自扶犁或亲自驾驭牲口.

sentences.en: He used to watch body building videos and plough through a daily diet of a dozen eggs and four pints of milk.
sentences.cn: 他曾经观看健身录像，并且熬过了每天12个鸡蛋和4品脱牛奶的饮食。

sentences.en: If we plough on until it's dark, we should get this field finished.
sentences.cn: 如果我们一直犁到天黑, 就可以把这块地犁完了.

sentences.en: In those days the land was plowed by oxen.
sentences.cn: 在那个年代是用公牛来犁地的。

sentences.en: It would pay farmers to plough up the scrub and plant wheat.
sentences.cn: 它会出钱雇农民开垦这块低矮丛林来种植麦子。

sentences.en: Mr. Dambar watched her plough through the grass.
sentences.cn: 丹巴尔先生看着她艰难地涉草而过。

sentences.en: The soil sticks to the blade and blocks the plough.
sentences.cn: 土粘在犁铧上，卡住了犁。

sentences.en: The water buffalo squelched up and down the paddy fields, pulling the plough.
sentences.cn: 水牛拉着犁,在稻田里咕唧咕唧地走着.

sentences.en: There are new tractors and new ploughs in the machinery lot.
sentences.cn: 机器设备场里有新拖拉机和新耕犁。

sentences.en: This is a soil reluctant to the plough.
This is early-20th-century rural Sussex, when horses still pulled the plough.
sentences.cn: 这是20世纪早期的萨塞克斯乡村，那时还是用马拉犁。

sentences.en: We must plough on somehow in spite of all the difficulties.
sentences.cn: 尽管困难重重,我们仍需坚持下去.

sentences.en: We possess ten acres of plough.
